sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState, useCallback } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Dashboard.css"; const Dashboard = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const [userSkills, setUserSkills] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [jobs, setJobs] = useState([]); // All jobs const [recommendedJobs, setRecommendedJobs] = useState([]); const [applications, setApplications] = useState([]); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ profileViews: 142, matches: 28, applications: 0, interviews: 4 }); const navigate = useNavigate(); const fetchData = useCallback(async (token, userData) => { try { // Fetch Skills const skillsRes = await axios.get("/api/skills/my-skills", { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }, }); setUserSkills(skillsRes.data); // Fetch Jobs const jobsRes = await axios.get("/api/jobs", { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }, }); setJobs(jobsRes.data); // Simple AI Match Simulation: Filter jobs by user skills if (skillsRes.data.length > 0) { const userSkillNames = skillsRes.data.map(s => s.skill_name.toLowerCase()); const matches = jobsRes.data.filter(job => job.skills_required && job.skills_required.some(req => userSkillNames.includes(req.toLowerCase())) ); setRecommendedJobs(matches.slice(0, 3)); // Top 3 matches } else { setRecommendedJobs(jobsRes.data.slice(0, 3)); // Fallback to newest 3 } // Fetch Applications (Student only) if (userData.role === 'student') { const appsRes = await axios.get("/api/applications/my", { headers: { Authorization: `Bearer ${token}` }, }); setApplications(appsRes.data); setStats(prev => ({ ...prev, applications: appsRes.data.length })); } } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching dashboard data:", error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }, []); useEffect(() => { const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); const savedUser = localStorage.getItem("user"); if (token && savedUser) { const userData = JSON.parse(savedUser); setUser(userData); fetchData(token, userData); } else { navigate("/login"); } }, [navigate, fetchData]); if (loading || !user) { return
Loading dashboard...
; } // Recruiter Dashboard Layout if (user.role === 'recruiter') { return (

Welcome back, {user.name.split(' ')[0]}

Manage your hiring pipeline and review applicants.

navigate('/post-job')}>

navigate('/my-jobs')}>

navigate('/my-jobs')}>Manage All
{jobs.filter(j => j.posted_by === user.id).slice(0, 3).map(job => (

{job.title}

{job.location} {job.job_type}
Active
Posted {new Date(job.created_at || Date.now()).toLocaleDateString()} {Math.floor(Math.random() * 20)} applicants
))}

New Applicant

10 mins ago
Job Approved
"UX Designer" listing is now live.
2 hours ago
); } // Student Dashboard Layout return (
{/* 1. Header */}

navigate('/jobs')}>View All

{job.company.charAt(0)}

{job.location} {Math.floor(Math.random() * 50) + 10} applicants
)) : (
No matches found. Try adding more skills!
)}

))}

)) : (

); }; export default Dashboard;
